lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We look forward to a 1988 year of consolidation while continuing our strong business development initiatives," BHP Steel chief executive officer David Rice told reporters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The new items of plant are now past their initial teething problems and talks have intensified with the unions on the industrial troubles, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Operational and commissioning problems flowing from the investment program, combined with the highest levels of industrial action since the steel plan started, had contributed to the decline in 1987 earnings, he said.
